fields.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
fields.description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a rich, meaty sauce.
fields.ingredients: spaghetti, ground beef, tomatoes, onions, garlic, olive oil, herbs
fields.steps: 1. Cook spaghetti. 2. Brown beef with onions and garlic. 3. Add tomatoes and herbs. 4. Simmer sauce and serve over pasta.

fields.title: Chocolate Cake
fields.description: A rich and moist chocolate cake perfect for any occasion.
fields.ingredients: flour, cocoa powder, sugar, eggs, butter, milk, baking powder, vanilla extract
fields.steps: 1. Mix dry ingredients. 2. Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth. 3. Bake at 350Â°F for 30-35 minutes.
